page.title: 08The Library
page.content: The Library was opened in 1972. It is open 30 hours a week with 3 people working there. They also have a mobile library. There are 6,753 members of the library. The total number of books is 17,14. They issue about 54,000 books a year at the library. Inside the library they have a children's corner and an adult's corner. The library is in the centre of the town between Grove St. and Rosemary Close and opposite the police station. The library is on the site of the old infants school. In the library they also have books about Petworth in the 19th century.
